1.content:
Evan Carpenter sat in the darkened living room, peaking cautiously through the blinds at the street outside. It was 10:30 at night, and his mom and dad had gone to bed early in preparation for their big trip tomorrow, but they were notoriously light sleepers. They had a bad habit of waking up and moving around the house when he was up to things he knew they didn’t approve of, and he’d been caught sneaking in and sneaking out many times. This time he wasn’t really doing either, but he still didn’t want them to know what he was doing.
There! Outside the window he saw the lights of a car slowing down to turn onto his driveway. On the roof of the car was the telltale illuminated Pizza Hut logo of a delivery car. Quickly, yet as silently as he could move, Evan hopped off the couch, padded off to the front door, and slipped out into the cold night air to meet the delivery car, leaving a wadded-up sock in the doorway to keep the screen door from slamming loudly shut behind him.
The door for the car opened, and out stepped an attractive redhead in a well-fitting Pizza Hut delivery girl’s uniform. She looked over at Evan as he approached the car and smiled, shaking her head.
“You’re something else, you know that, Evan?”
“I’m something else? My parents are something else,” Evan whispered. “You know how they are about me eating junk food. I have to be sneaky if I’m going to get any at all.”
“I know how they are, but I know how you are too. You keep sneaking this much junk food and soon you’ll be too fat to be any good at sneaking.” She gave his hard-to-ignore potbelly a playful jab with her finger.
“It’s a price I’m glad to pay, Katie. “
Katie was a senior at Evan’s high school, and, as with most other people he knew who worked in the local fast food industry, he’d endeavored to get closer to her, and, by association, closer to the food she served. It hadn’t taken more than a few of these conspiratorial late-night deliveries for Katie to figure out Evan’s situation: he was a foodaholic who had unaccommodating parents. Unlike some of the other people who had figured this out, however, Katie didn’t really seem to care, and since he tipped her well, she had come to appreciate the chubby boy’s quirks, and gladly played along with them. Plus, even though he was two years younger than her and noticeably obese, there was something about him that she had to admit was kind of cute.
“Speaking of prices, that’ll be $32.50,” she said, hefting four large pizza boxes out of the car and gingerly setting them on the steps to Evan’s house. Evan handed her the money in exact change, plus a hefty tip.
“So you’re really going to eat all these on your own?” She remarked. “You’re not having a slumber party or anything?”
“Yup. These are all mine.”
“That’s….impressive, I suppose.” Her tone suggested that she wasn’t entirely sure if she was genuinely impressed or disgusted. “This is a lot even for you, don’t you think? Are we celebrating something?”
“You could say that…” Evan replied.

What is Evan Celebrating?


1: The Joneses invited Evan to join them for a two week trip at a beach resort, complete with full access to a luxury spa and unlimited endless buffets.

2: The Joneses have won a year's supply of free dessert foods, and have offered to share the wealth

3: The Joneses plan to go on a well-stocked camping trip, and Evan is invited

4: Evan's parents are leaving the country for a year, and Evan is temporarily moving in with the Joneses, and will simply be living their normal lifestyle with them.

5: More options...

11.content:
“Let’s just say I’m looking forward to having some newfound freedoms.” Evan said coyly.
“Those are always nice.” Katie took the money and had Evan sign for the delivery. “Well, you have a good rest of the night.” She eyed the stack of four pizzas with renewed incredulity. “Try not to rupture your stomach lining or anything.”
Evan smiled. “I’ve never eaten a meal that could even fill me up. I think I can handle it.”
“Well more power to you. Take care.” Katie hopped into her car and drove off into the night.
Evan awkwardly hefted the four large pizza boxes and cautiously reopened the door. He eased the door shut behind him as cautiously as possible, ever concerned about waking his strict parents. Carrying the heavy load of boxes through the house in the dark was even more challenging, and he had to move very cautiously to avoid crashing into anything.
The scent arising from the warm boxes he held was intoxicating. It took every ounce of willpower he had to keep from tearing into the boxes right on the living room floor, but he knew if he lingered, that same smell might reach his parents, and that was the last thing he wanted. No, he had to reach the sanctity of his room.
Finally, after scaling a treacherous staircase and easing the door to his room shut, he could relax. Only, he wasn’t interested in relaxing. He was interested in pizza.
He sat on his bed and opened two of the boxes. They were both 14 inch meatlovers and, per his special arrangements with Katie, they had double the already excessive amount of toppings. He grabbed a slice in each hand, and immediately began to feast.
What Evan said was true: he had never eaten a meal that had actually filled him up, and despite the fact that this little “midnight snack” of his contained more than 16,000 calories, it was not going to be the exception to the rule. It took him about twenty minutes to down the first pizza, twenty more to get through the second. He had eaten almost seven pounds of food, but he wasn’t even coming close to capacity.
His shirt was, though. With each inch-thick slice of pizza he crammed into his mouth, his stomach bulged more assertively outwards, turning from a floppy paunch that typically hung about an inch and a half over his pants into a swollen half-globe that was cautiously peering out into the world beyond the hem of his shirt and weighing the options of exploring it further. By the time he was about halfway done with his third pizza, his gut had expanded to roughly the size of a volleyball, and was hanging out of his increasingly inadequate shirt a good two inches.
He couldn’t care less. He paid no attention to the creaking seams of his t-shirt as he barreled on through his meal. He ate another slice, and another, and by the time he had finished the third pizza, his shirt had become stretched so tight it was almost transparent, and its seams were perilously near their breaking point.
As he finished his fourth and final slice of pizza, his shirt began to die. A tear appeared along his right side, and another appeared over his belly button. Well, that is, it appeared over the part of his shirt that had been covering his belly button before he started eating. His belly button had worked its way out of his shirt’s custody by the end of the third pizza, and was now hanging out of the bottom of his shirt along with a good six inches of extra flesh. His astonishing belly was now the size of a mid-sized beach ball, and it imposed onto his lap up until about mid-thigh.
He stood up to brush the crumbs off his bed and set the boxes aside. As he did, his belly sloshed and churned with him. His shirt rode up even higher as he stood, settling about two inches above his impressive lovehandles, in much the same way that a person might cautiously back up a hill away from dangerous rising floodwaters. It was in vain, though. Evan was a nice guy, but he was murder on shirts.
Evan sat back down and rubbed his swollen belly in satisfaction. In spite of its alarming increase in size, he was pretty sure he could fit four more pizzas in there, if he had any more. There was probably quite a bit of food lying around the house that he could get at if he was quiet, and the thought of putting even more food, even if it was his parents’ irritatingly healthy crap, into his gut was enticing. However, there was a risk of being caught, and given his current state, he wouldn’t be anywhere near as stealthy as he was earlier. Plus, it was going to be hard enough hiding the effects of this binge in the morning as it was. Did he dare risk foraging for more food? Or should he wait until his visit to the Jones’s in the morning?

114.content:
Though doing so meant going against his very nature and employing a degree of self-restraint that he had previously only ever pretended to possess, Evan ultimately decided that the potential bliss of eating more food was not worth the potential risk of discovery. If his mom or dad caught him in his current state, with a food-filled, globe-sized gut drooping out of his shirt, they would undoubtedly freak out, and might even cancel their trip to stay home and deal with their insane glutton of a son. Naturally, that would entirely defy the purpose of Evan’s celebratory meal. One night of restraint, Evan decided, was more than a fair exchange for one week of excess.
Evan removed his ruined shirt and tossed it in the wastebasket instead of his laundry hamper, and he stripped down to his briefs. He turned off the light and went to bed, praying he could fall asleep before too long so the next day would come all the quicker.

1142.content:
Evan awoke the next morning to the sound of his growling stomach, as always. As he pried himself out of bed, he noticed that his belly had fortunately shrunken to a somewhat more socially acceptable size, even though he did feel a bit softer overall. He padded over to his bathroom to brush his teeth and do his business, and then he pulled out his scale to weigh himself. He did this every day, not because he personally cared how high the numbers went, but because his parents did. He knew if his weight went over a certain point, they would put him on a crash diet again. He was sure that pounds would be gained over the course of the next week…probably a great many of them in fact…and he would likely be made to regret it when Mom and Dad came home. All the more reason to make the most of this week, as far as he was concerned.
The number on the scale was not particularly surprising to him: he’d gained four more pounds since he weighed himself yesterday. It wasn’t a shabby gain by any means, although it was nowhere close to his 15th birthday record of twelve pounds. Boy was that a memorable birthday! And that had been in spite of his parents’ supervision.
Evan thought back to that day with fondness. He’d gone to a buffet with a bunch of his friends for a party, including the Joneses. Given the size of the party (he’d had almost 30 other kids there), his parents were having a hard time keeping everyone organized. He’d used that distraction to his advantage, and managed to devour 35 heaping plates of food in addition to four helpings of cake and ice cream. His gut had been the size of an exercise ball by the end of the day. Yet even then, he’d felt like he could have gone further.
Evan put the pleasant memory to rest and began to get dressed. His jeans still fit okay, although they were beginning to get a bit tight in the butt area, as well as the waistband. His shirts were somewhat more problematic. He tried on several that simply would not cover him, finally discovering that an old T-shirt of his dad’s which had ended up in his laundry somehow did manage to cover his stomach completely, but it was a very close call. He’d have to watch his movements while around his parents; any significant bending over or raising of his arms would instantly reveal several inches of chub. Evan made a mental note to swing by Wal-Mart on his way to the Joneses to pick up some new shirts in the next size up. Or maybe two sizes up, just to be safe.

11422.content:
When Evan left his room, he noticed a stillness in the house around him. A thrill went through him at the thought that his parents might have left already, thereby giving him the chance to gorge on whatever goodies he could find before heading to the Joneses’ house, but he was cautious. He crept through the house, checking from room to room. Finally, he ended up in the kitchen, and noticed a note on the fridge:
Dear Evan,
We hope you have fun with the Joneses while we’re away. Please remember to take your vitamins, and stay away from carbs. We love you!
Mom and Dad.
“Love you too,” Evan grumbled, as he ripped the paper off the fridge, pulled the door open, grabbed a full carton of 1% milk, and began to chug the entire thing.
His bulging belly undulated with each swallow, and a small trickle of spillage ran down his chin. He wasted very little, however, and within two minutes, he’d emptied the entire jug. He patted his swollen gut, and proceeded to raid the fridge, the pantries, and everything else of any food that looked remotely tasty to him.
There wasn't much. His mom, perhaps anticipating a binge session like this, had allowed their food stores to run depressingly low. As always, there were very few foods in the house that would be appetizing to anyone but an absolute health nut, but Evan hoarded everything good he could find. And devoured it.
He found a package of low-fat cookies, two packages of saltine crackers, a carton of sugar-free ice cream, and a box of whole-grain cereal. He also found a package of low-fat sausages, which he fried up for himself, and a few boxes of TV-dinners his mom had bought his dad to take with him to work. All in all, he was able to assemble a pretty decent spread of halfway acceptable food, and he chowed down like a starving man.
It took him about an hour, but eventually he finished everything he’d acquired for himself. It amounted to about fifteen pounds of food, and hie looked very nearly pregnant. His belly had swollen once again to match its size from last night, and was again unwilling to be restrained by his shirt. It hung over the edge of his pants, leaving two full inches of skin clearly visible.
Although he still felt a desire for more food, there was nothing left in the house he considered “food.” He then resolved to...

114222.content:
“Alright,” Evan said aloud to himself. “The Joneses always have a lot of food, but then…they also always eat a lot of food. I may be fed more there than I am here, but I may not get the chance to eat as much as I want, having to compete with appetites like those…”
He needed a proper binge session, and now was as good a time as any to fulfill one of his lifelong dreams: To eat one of everything off a fast food menu in one sitting.
Evan grabbed the envelop he’d been storing his lawnmowing money in. He had $312.00 in it, which he’d been saving to buy an X-Box One and some new games for it, but deep down, he always knew what he was really saving that money for. He was saving it for a day like this; a day when he could blow a huge amount of money on the biggest, fattiest meal his body could handle.
The Joneses only lived a mile away, but since Evan didn’t have his license yet, that meant he’d have to walk there. This would have been torture on the poor fat boy, and he’d originally been planning to call Mrs. Jones to come pick him up. However, he decided walking would be worth it this time: there were no fewer than five restaurants between his house and theirs, and he was determined to gorge himself at at least one of them.
He took his money and began walking down the suburban road, his heavy belly sagging out of his shirt and bobbing and jostling with every step. He noticed disapproving stares from several of his neighbors, but he paid them no mind. He’d worked hard for this belly, and he’d be damned if anyone was going to stop him from filling it further this time.
Originally, he’d planned on stopping at Hong-Chow Chinese Buffet, since it was his favorite of the five restaurants on his route and would have the biggest selection. However, by the time he reached the Burger King, his stomach was growling so loudly, he wasn’t sure he could help himself from stopping in there first.

1142222.content:
In the end, his greed and gluttony won him over, and he simply couldn’t stand the long walk to the Chinese buffet before getting his meal. He slipped into the Burger King, waited patiently in line, and stepped up to the register to order his meal.
“Can I help you, sir?” said the girl at the register. Evan thought it was funny that she called him sir, since she looked like she was probably his exact same age. She was pretty, with brown hair pulled into a ponytail and dark brown eyes. Those eyes kept flickering back and forth from making contact with his eyes and his protruding gut, though she looked like she was trying to be polite and not embarrass anybody. Her nametag read “Candy.”
Evan smiled. “Hi, Candy. I’d like a number one, a number two, a number three, a number four, a number five…”
Candy’s dark eyes grew wider and wider as Evan continued to list every meal combo on the menu, ordering everything in “large.” Finally, after asking for a number 20, Evan finished. “Umm…that’ll be $108.69.” Evan gladly paid her.
Candy told Evan that his order would take a while, so he went ahead and sat down. After about 15 minutes, they finally brought out his meals. With 20 orders of large fries and onion rings, 20 large drinks, and 20 various assorted boxes of burgers, chicken sandwiches, and nuggets, it ended up taking four whole tables simply to hold all of Evan’s food.
“Will anyone else be joining you?” Candy asked, staring in astonishment as Evan began grabbing handfuls of fries and chowing down on them.
“Nope. Just me,” Evan said through a mouthful of food.

Evan began by unwrapping every burger, opening every box, and pouring all the fries and onion rings onto one tray. He had no idea if he could handle this much food all in one sitting, but he was determined to give it his best try, and that meant cutting down every barrier that might impede him. Once he got started eating, he didn't want to have to spend a spare second unwrapping anything, or fumbling with packaging to get at his meal. He planned to do nothing but scarf until he either finished it or reached his limit.
The burgers were incredible. He couldn't recall the last time he'd had one, and each miraculous bite made him more excited for the next. He only seemed to gain momentum as he went, downing one burger after another, shoving fistfuls of fries down his gullet with almost orgasmic delight. Each new sandwich he devoured was like an awakening for him; a torrent of flavors he'd been denied for so long now filled his life with flavors he'd never known before he couldn't live without.
The fries dwindled before him, the emptied cups stacking high beside him. He was almost in a trance as he gradually consumed every last piece of food at the table. He barely noticed as his food-stuffed belly swelled to the size of a soccer ball, separating his now unbuttonable pants as the zipper crept downward of its own accord. The stares of both patrons and employees were lost on him. He experienced only the nirvana of pure gluttony, and he knew there was no going back to his old life now.
He pushed himself away from the table, gathered the foot-high pile of crumpled food wrappers onto one of his trays, and slowly carried it to the garbage can, his hugely distended belly bouncing above his crotch with each step.
As he dumped the debris from his conquest into the can, he was astonished to realize that he could probably still eat more. He still had to get to the Jones's house, and he knew there would still definitely be food waiting for him there. He was definitely full enough to make it the rest of the way there without being uncomfortably hungry, for sure. But his newfound hedonistic side was telling him he really shouldn't stop eating if he felt like he still could...

He walked up to the counter, bulging gut resting heavily against it. He ordered five more Whoppers, each with a large order of fries, and their largest sized drink. A few minutes later, Candy awkwardly handed him the heavy take-out bag and oversized cup, and he gladly accepted them.

Honestly, the breeze felt nice against his stomach, and was a cool relief from the hot summer day. He was moving a bit slower than he had on his way in, sweating a little more and breathing a little more heavily. He still barely noticed. While he was eating, he may as well have been in another world.
By the time he reached the Joness' house, he had finished his second meal completely. 1142222111.content:
“Evan!” Karen beamed at him and embraced him in a tight hug. Evan blushed a little as he felt his friend’s mom’s body press into his plumpened frame: her generous breasts squashing against his developing moobs and her slightly plump potbelly pressing into his overfull sloshing gut.
As she pulled away, she cast her eyes up and down his newly enhanced proportions.
“My goodness, you’re looking so healthy today!” she said, with a twinkle in her eye. “It’s good to see you’re finally eating properly.”
She gave his bloated belly a playful slosh with both hands. “You look more and more like Graham every day. Come on inside.”
“Thanks Mrs. Jones,” Evan replied, as he waddled slowly into the house.
He couldn’t help but notice that Karen seemed to have put on a bit of extra weight herself recently. Her generous hips seemed to sway a bit more assertively than usual, her plump backside pulling her pants intriguingly tight. A pronounced muffin top was peeking its way around the circumference of her blouse as well. She looked to have gained about ten to fifteen pounds since Evan had seen her last, and she’d stored it beautifully.
As he thumped down the hallway and entered the dining room, where the rest of the family was, he discovered that Karen’s gain was not unique.
Given the Jones’s universal propensity for gluttony, it was far from unheard of for one of them to gain as much as ten pounds over a particularly hungry week. However, it looked as if all of them had piled on an unusually large amount of weight since the last time he’d seen them.
Erin sat at the table in an ill-fitting tank top that more closely resembled a flimsy sports bra. Her G-cup boobs were barely restrained by it, and her swollen belly took up most of her lap. She looked like she’d fattened her way up to about 195-200 lbs.
Graham sat at the head of the table, shirtless as usual. His many rolls had completely consumed his own lap, and his belly was threatening to push him away from the table, while his tremendous ass was beginning to droop over the sides of his chair. He looked like he could have easily been up to 330 lbs now, maybe more.
But “little” Natalie was perhaps the most impressive. Her tremendous belly was now hanging confidently over her knees and pressing her cartoonishly small shirt to just under her flabby chest. Roll upon roll adorned her young frame, a trio of chins jiggling ferociously as she shoveled food into her mouth with both hands. Her meager clothes looked like they could burst off her at any second, and from the stack of not-yet eaten burgers in front of her, Evan suspected that very thing could happen soon. She must have easily passed her mother’s weight by now, possibly even Erin’s, which was utterly gargantuan on her young frame.
All three Jones children continued ravenously shoveling food into their mouths, as if they hadn’t eaten in days.
“You must be famished, Evan. Please, help yourself,” Karen said warmly. She pulled out a chair and placed an entire pizza in front of Evan as he sat down heavily.
This is better than I could have ever hoped for, thought Evan as he eagerly tore into the food.
Between stuffed mouthfuls, Evan attempted to make some conversation.

Evan's now fully awakened gluttony was so powerful he couldn't even really think of speaking until he was four slices into his pizza. Looking back and fourth between the three Jones siblings as they relentlessly shoveled slice after slice into their own mouths, he wondered how much they had already eaten today. They didn't seem to be slowing down at all, and from the stack of unopened pizza boxes sitting in the middle of the table, it didn't look like they planned to slow down any time soon either. The Joneses had always been big eaters as long as he'd known them, but from the looks of things, they had really taken it to a new level recently.
Evan swallowed the unnecessarily large bite he'd just taken of his sixth slice of pizza, and turned to Karen. "What's the occasion, Mrs. Jones? Are we celebrating something today?"
Karen finished her own slice of pizza in three large bites, then paused to swallow before answering. "Not that I'm aware of. Although, come to think of it, we should have prepared a special dinner to celebrate your first night with us! Why do you ask?" She barely allowed her last word to be spoken before taking a generous bite of her next slice.
No special occasion? They can't possibly eat like this every day... The thought was too good to possibly be true. "I just meant, why all the pizza? Is this a normal meal?"
"Just on Mondays and Fridays" Erin mumbled around a mouthful of pizza. "Tomorrow it's burgers and hot dogs. Wednesday it's pasta."
Evan chewed in silent thought for a moment. It sounded like this meal, or at least the size of it, was indeed normal for the Joneses now. He wasn't sure if he wanted to question it, not wanting to seem rude to his hosts, but at the same time, he had to know. "I meant...I've never seen so much food in one meal before. I know my parents are a bit diet crazy, but...when did you guys" -- He paused for a moment as Karen placed another entire pizza in front of him, even though he still had two slices left of his first -- "When did you guys start eating like this?"
"Oh, I see what you mean," Karen said warmly. "Well..."

"You know the company Waeton Foods?" Karen asked.
Evan had, of course heard of them. Waeton Foods was the parent company of practically every local fast food chain. They owned everything from the local pizzerias to the burger joints to the Chinese buffet he hadn't had the chance to eat at today. Just thinking of all the restaurants they owned made him hungrier. He nodded in response to her question, too engrossed with finishing his first pizza and starting on the second to waste precious mouth movements talking.
"Well," Karen continued between bites, "They have an experimental promotion going on right now. Every time you order food from one of their restaurants, you can earn loyalty points. As you gain more loyalty points, you get discounts from their stores. The more loyalty points you get, the bigger the discount. The more food you get from their restaurants, the cheaper it gets."
Finally coming up for air from his own gorging, Graham chimed in. "Don't forget the contest, Mom."
Karen finished her own pizza, then moved onto a new one. Evan wondered how many she'd had already. It looked like her shirt was stretched even tighter than when he'd come in. He could see a hint of skin between the buttons that wasn't there before. "I couldn't possibly forget, dear. Evan, in addition to the discounts themselves, Waeton Foods is offering a special prize to the family that buys the most food from their restaurants. At the end of the month, that family is given a month of free food from each location."
"We're going to win it," Erin said, winking. "And then we'll win it again the next month. And the one after that. Free food for eating more than everyone else."
"Well, that's the idea, anyway," Karen said. "This is only the first month of the promotion. We're spending a lot on their food right now, but the way our family eats I'm confident we'll win, and it'll be a sound investment in the long run." As if to punctuate her sentence, one of Natalie's buttons flew across the table, followed by a second. Nobody seemed to pay it any mind, least of all Natalie, who hadn't looked up from stuffing her tubby cheeks since Evan had sat down.
"And now that you're hear to visit us, Evan, I'm even more confident we'll be able to win it. Please, have more. Eat as much as you can hold."

Who knows how many burgers, hot dogs and other delicious junk foods they went through in a week? Katie was right; Evan would almost certainly blow up like a balloon eating like that, but the pure bliss of gorging on an endless buffet was well worth that particular cost.
“You should be happy, then. Come next week, you’re going to be sending 30 pizzas to their house every week. “
Katie blinked at him, bewildered. “You are one weird kid, you know that? If my boyfriend loved me half as much as you love food, we’d be on our honeymoon by now.”
Evan winked, taking the heavy armload of pizza boxes from her. “What can I say? I’m loyal to my first love, and I always try to make as much room in my life for it.”
She rolled her eyes, tucked the money into her pouch, and walked back to her car. “Goodnight, Evan. Enjoy your weird binging session.”
Evan carefully shut the door, sneaking as quietly as he could back to his room with about twelve pounds of pizza in his arms. Finally reaching the safety of his room, he pried open the first box with about as much eager anticipation as a pirate opening a treasure chest.
“This isn’t a binging session,” he thought to himself. “This is the smallest meal I’ll eat for a very long time.”

info.brief_description: A repressed foodaholic teen spends vacation with a family of huge foodies. Fatness ensues
info.description:
Eating up with the Joneses
16 year-old Evan Carpenter loves to eat. He would gladly spend every spare minute of every day doing nothing but cramming as much food into himself as he can manage. Unfortunately for him, his parents have never really approved of his tendency to overeat, and have kept him on a very strict diet for most of his life.
One day, however, Evanâs fortunes changed. Turns out, his parents are going out of town for an extended trip, and he gets to stay with some friends until they come home. Not just any friends, though: he gets to stay with the Jones family.
The Jones are a family that universally share Evanâs desire for food, possibly even more than he does. For the first time ever, Evan will get to spend each day eating whatever he wants, whenever he wants, with people who love food as much as he does. The time has come for them to really go wild, and their lives, and waistlines, will never be the same.
Characters:
Evan Carpenter: 16. Our protagonist: a boy who loves to eat food more than anything else, and has been waiting all his life for the chance to finally indulge his insatiable gluttony. Despite his parentâs efforts to keep him slim, heâs become a rather plump 215 lbs.
Graham Jones: 16. Evanâs best friend, and fellow food lover. Since he has grown up in a family that loves food and cares nothing about obesity, he has become a quite husky 300 lbs.
Erin Jones: 15 Grahamâs sister. She has had an enormous crush on Evan for years, and would gladly do anything to get his attention. She is a plump and buxom 175 lbs.
Natalie Jones: 6. The youngest of the Jones family, and proportionally the fattest. She eats nonstop and has a very low metabolism. Her belly hangs out of every shirt she owns because she outgrows them almost instantly. 150 lbs.
Karen Jones: 32. The single mother of the family. She is quite young to be a mother of teens. She loves food as much as her children, but is somewhat more concerned with making sure they have enough than she is with keeping herself fed. She does not approve of Evanâs parentsâs refusal to indulge his tremendous appetite, and is eager to ensure that his every desire is satisfied while he stays in her home. She is the most physically fit member of the family (for now) at a still chubby 165
Rules:
This is a story about extreme weight gain.Any/all characters can gain weight, but please keep the focus on the gain. The gain can be in unrealistic quantities, but no more than about a hundred pounds in one day, and the gaining should come from eating only (no magic insta-gain rays or whatever)

Short chapters

Immobility (Just don't go overboard and do the "OMG he was fatter than Mt. Everest" thing. No more than a couple tons, max)
